summary: PHPDoc type hints are incorrectly specified for typed arguments in ServiceContainer, causing Psalm static analysis to fail with type mismatch errors.
userImpact: Developers using Psalm for static analysis encounter false type errors, hindering code quality checks and IDE support.
rootCause: PHPDoc blocks for typed arguments conflict with actual type declarations, causing Psalm to report incorrect type mismatches.
proposedFix: Remove PHPDoc type hints for arguments that have native PHP type declarations.
resolutionDetails: Resolved by removing redundant PHPDoc type hints for typed parameters.
keyQuote: It would be great don't use phpdoc blocks for typed arguments.
